moves.1. d4 Nf6 2. c4 g6 3. Nc3 d5 4. Bg5 Ne4: Not a main line, but still popular position
moves.5. Nxe4: Possible with the idea of strong pawn center for White, but that is easily reached by other stronger moves
moves.5... dxe4 6. e3 Bg7 7. f3 c5: The main idea of the opening
moves.8. fxe4 Qb6: And the strong center becomes illusion
moves.9. b3: Final wrong move, starting a combination for Black
Winning a piece and saving attack with possible Bg4
